e="preserve">Elsa Raven (born Elsa Rabinowitz; September 21, 1929 – November 3, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Charleston, South Carolina. She was best known for her two years (1988–1990) on the sitcom "Amen" and playing the mother of Vincent Terranova on the TV series "Wiseguy".
She played Ida Straus in the 1997 movie "Titanic" and had a voice role in the 1981 animated movie "American Pop".
Raven died at her home in Los Angeles on November 3, 2020 at the age of 91.
